title: Fragment, 15th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: two interconnected structures (lampas)
inscribed: Translated: "Glory to our master, the Sultan".
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 67.9 x 48.3 cm (26 3/4 in. x 19 in.)
description: Horizontal stripes of pattern with stars and flowers alternate with lines of Arabic text, in colors of red, yellow, green, blue, and white.

Fragment, 15th century.
